One female colleague found love after being divorced and single for years. She listened to The Genius Wave for 3 weeks, then randomly bumped carts with a man at Trader Joe’s. Now, the two are engaged.

Some lost weight. One colleague lost 16lbs after listening to The Genius Wave.

Others quit smoking and other bad habits. One of Dr. Rivers’ colleagues had smoked cigarettes for 11 years, then suddenly lost the urge to smoke after listening to The Genius Wave. He claims it was like his behavior towards smoking “had been reprogrammed.”

Others received promotions. One colleague listened to The Genius Wave every day, then received a promotion for which she was sure she would be passed over.

Many colleagues felt they were thinking about their lives in a larger way after listening to The Genius Wave. Instead of focusing on small tasks, they were focusing on big picture items.

Here are some of the reviews shared by verified purchasers on the official website:
